import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' const ForgottenPassword = () => { const [password, setPassword] = useState(''); const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState(''); const [emailFound, setEmailFound] = useState(false); return (
Email Enter your email address {emailFound === true && <> New Password setPassword(e.target.value)}/> Confirm Password setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)}/> }
) } export default ForgottenPassword;
